name: FORT LEWIS COLLEGE FOUNDATION
description: Support higher education and charitable objectives of Fort Lewis College
sampleDescriptions:
HR.1528 & S.660: Native American Indian Education Act: 
A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 in order to fulfill the Federal mandate to provide higher educational opportunities for Native
